participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Sociable and friendly, enjoys spending time with others at the gym and has a passion for cars.
participant_1.background: i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i like to spend my money on cars. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Caring and family-oriented, enjoys spending time with her siblings and has a love for pets.
participant_2.background: i've one brother. i live in alabama. i love dogs. i've three sisters. i like tacos.
